quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don’t go through life, grow through life.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
author: Ginni Rometty

quote: Do not despise the growing small beginnings, for the Lord rejoices to see the work begin.
author: Zechariah 4:10

quote: The only way to grow is to challenge yourself.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: We can’t become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Mistakes are the growing pains of wisdom.
author: William Jordan

quote: Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but of unlearning old limits.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: If we’re growing, we’re always going to be out of our comfort zone.
author: John Maxwell

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Growth begins when we start to accept our own weakness.
author: Jean Vanier

quote: Every problem is a gift—without problems we would not grow.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
author: George Eliot

quote: Without struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Don’t fear failure. Fear being in the exact same place next year as you are today.
author: Michael Hyatt

quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don’t belong.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quote: A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
author: Unknown

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward.
author: Ellen Glasgow

quote: The great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman
